name: Prima Chicken Sausages
description: High quality Prima Chicken meat is processed into Prima Chicken value added products. These include succulent sausages, cold meats, meatballs & burgers prepared to recipes that appeal to all consumers. Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
